website_summaries.verdict: A perfect pick for customers seeking an inexpensive double leash with a comfortable handle.
pros: Lightweight design works well for dogs of all sizes
Includes a soft foam handle for easy grip and control
Customers enjoy the product's convenient length
cons: Some buyers had issues with durability

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my dog from pulling!
customer_reviews.text: My one dog (husky lab mix on the left) is the absolute worst on a leash. We have tried multiple different harnesses and collars. Nothing worked on her pulling. She is such a good dog, but she gets on a leash and thinks we are hunting. Someone suggested a dual leash and it was a life saver! My two over 70 lbs dogs did so great with it. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Great way to walk two dogs at once.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and helps keep my dogs connected on walks. Really helps me control the two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Vacaville1

customer_reviews.title: Love this leash!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this leash! Walking two 100lb dogs can be tough sometimes, especially for leash tangling. This leash is perfect and really works well for keeping them tangle free. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melaina Dressing

customer_reviews.title: Strong and well made
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Well made, strong enough for medium to larger dogs. When walking, dogs pull on each other, not me. CONS: The Y feature of this lead can cause issues if your dogs don't always walk in line, directly in front of you. Several times during the walk I have to step over the lead to bring it around to my front again. If the dogs lag behind and cross, it is a tripping hazard.
customer_reviews.author: MyJoyaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality leash! Love that it doesn't tangle when the dog croos paths.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 2 Dog Leash
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Newfies and one person walking them with 2 leashes means getting tangled and untangled. This product allows one person to walk 2 dogs without getting tangled up. It is very strong also as I have 250lbs of dog attached that like to chase squirrels. Great product and I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Great leash!
customer_reviews.text: When my bigger dog runs it definitely pulls me but once she starts walking she not pulling me as much. It does relieve me of some pulling. My dogs walk together for the most part but if one stops to pee the other still pulls and it’s harder for me to stop them from pulling the other dog than if they had separate leashes. I do like having them on one leash and I love the clicker/whistle and baggie holder. This is the first time using it so I might have a better update after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Camryn

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great leash! It would be easier if they walked the same speed. I have a 105lb American bulldog who lags behind and a lab mix who's ready to run. I get tangled up because of this. Nothing against the leash just a stubborn bully lol
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: My doggies love their walks
customer_reviews.text: This is the second double leash ordered. My doggies love their walks. The second leash was a gift to my daughter & her 2 small pets. Very satisfied & happy with the. Product.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Cavallin

customer_reviews.title: A bit big for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: The pros: 1. Very sturdy 2. Soft 3. Enough length to allow separation between the dogs The cons: 1. The hardware & diameter of the rope are bigger than I expected. Most suitable for dogs of at least 20 lbs, but overkill for my dainty 10-pounders. This is an aesthetic concern--there's nothing wrong with the leash.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl J.Top Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: THIS LEASH FAILED!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that the leash didn't tangle when the dogs start running around each other. I have two boarder collies that I just rescued and each weigh about 50 pounds. The leash was great for a couple of months of use but then broke when one of my dogs lunged at a huge Newfoundland type dog. Just when I needed it most, THIS LEASH FAILED! It broke right above the swivel, so both dogs, tethered together, ran away form me at full sprint. Fortunately the Newfoundland was well behaved and probably felt like he had nothing to prove and just sat there. This would be fine for smaller breads, but not reliable for larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Doink

customer_reviews.title: I Really Wanted to Like This Leash!
customer_reviews.text: Straight up- it needs bigger snap hooks in my opinion. Otherwise put in the description this leash is meant for smaller dogs. I do some pretty extensive walks with my 60 and 90 pound labradoodles. The leash itself seems sturdy and I actually liked the quality of the rest of it, but I can't risk one of those cheesy cleats breaking from a harness that the snap barely fits on. The picture is a comparison of the snap hook (top snap) I think should be used and labled for large dogs- the bottom small one is what is on this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: It's well made...but....
customer_reviews.text: It's well made and works as promised. I especially appreciate the handle and the no-tangle design. But...for me, the dual leash would work better if the split was closer to the dogs. This length of individual leads allows active dogs to get tangled. I have tied the leash so that the split takes place much closer to my dogs and it works so much better for my purpose. I think the design as sold would work better with those dogs that walk passively next to each other. That isn't the case with my young, curious dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Deb, etc.

customer_reviews.title: Good leash...this Canine Specialist approves...
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended for training. Ok, I do not do Looooooong reviews. I DO like to give accurate information on products. KandiesTreatsReviewVideos. I usually do videos, unless the product is self explanatory. I have 3 dogs(St. Poodle, Scottie, Mini Schnauzer), also I'm a retired Master Groomer and Canine Behaviorist....if this helps Ok the main lease is basic with a padded handle that IS comfortable, yes. The two extensions ARE bungee...if your dog tries to lunge the leash "boing" right back. IT DOES NOT TANGLE UP unless you tie the dogs out or drop the leash. It DOES turn 360°. Seller also sends free gifts with purchase. Ok simple....it works. The main leash IS a little shorter but not by much.
customer_reviews.author: TheDisabledBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This leash broke in less than a month. My dogs are 15 pounds and they have spiked collars (so not much pulling going on at all!!!! as you can imagine) and they still were able to break one side in no time. I am very disappointed with this product, the quality is just unacceptable. I have a Coach leash that is 3 years old and is still in excellent shape. I can't imagine using this double leash on bigger dogs - it will probably break in days. I do not recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Stein

customer_reviews.title: Very Versitle
customer_reviews.text: Great lease for the price. All the hardware that it includes gives you a lot of configuration options. I only have the one dog, but I use it with a harness, so the bungee section is normally doubled up. I can instead connect the bungee end to end for a longer leash, or grab the middle if I need to keep him close momentarily. Better than dealing with the slack of a longer leash. Also easy to tie him up without trying to figure out the correct knot. Already got a second one to keep in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's perfect for my 2 chihuahuas. I love that it's tangle free too!
customer_reviews.author: rachel kraft

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 50 pound dogs and use this daily. They can pull sometimes, but the padded grip is very comfortable. The plus is that since they’re both attached, they can correct the pulling themselves because one doesn’t wanna get jerked around by the other. I’ve had it for months and it’s still in great condition! EDIT: the mechanism that opens the hook has broken after 8 months. I’ve contacted the company to see if they will replace the leash, as I have other leashes that are YEARS old and still work fine. EDIT 2: The company replied within hours and is sending me a replacement. Definite kudos!
customer_reviews.author: xjoshi

customer_reviews.title: Lack of durability as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this leash for my 2 female huskies (both under 50 lbs) and the leash is already falling apart as the braid just above the swivel is unraveling. It promotes durability which is completely inaccurate. I would expect a leash to last no less than 1-2 years. I bought another for my boyfriend's 2 male huskies and the handle broke on that less than 30 days after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Travis

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little better, but it works well.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It is missing a part that it could have made it much better. There needs to be some kind of hook below where the two leashes attach to the one. That way, you can keep your dogs as close or as far from each other as needed. Otherwise, it is very strong and durable even with 100+ lb dog on each side. The handle is a little on the cheap end, but comfortable nonetheless. Best used for calm dogs. If your dogs are spastic in all directions, you might have a hard time with this. Update: customer service is very good and respond promptly to any issue. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Owner

customer_reviews.title: Useful and a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This leash is a lifesaver! I’ve got a GSD as well as a husky, one a puppy and one is 2 years old. Though I agree with the other posters that I wish the lead was connected closer to the dogs than it is to the user, this is a great way to walk 2 dogs. It took a bit of getting used to, as my pup is traveling all directions and speeds where my husky is walking straight. It made it a challenge to keep them in line, but it would have been impossible with using 2 leashes! I’m so grateful that I found this!
customer_reviews.author: BirdieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: first impression...GOOD
customer_reviews.text: first impression...GOOD! I have done 2 walks with 2 small 12-15lb dogs...one is crazy energy and the other is mellow. They never got tangled even once. The leash is sturdy and very good quality The leash material is very good quality and the clip attachments are strong and good quality. The adjustable of the leash is a nice feature and is easy to adjust. I dont like the bungee/ springy of the lower leash sections...well made but the pull created does affect the other dog by pulling them. The bungee also doesn't give you immediate control if you need to pull the dogs under control. The bungee also allows the dogs an extra foot or so.
customer_reviews.author: JDG

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this for my 2 dogs, 28 lbs and 12 lbs. They usually love to walk side by side, but the awesome thing about this leash is the "give" that the bungee cords allow. One can stop and sniff something briefly or one can stop to piddle and they don't choke each other. It also allows them to switch positions without getting tangled. I like the adjustable length feature too. 4 stars for Durability since I haven't had it long enough to know how it will hold up. Great price too! Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Richards

customer_reviews.title: Makes walking the pups sooooo much more comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is wonderful! It doesn't stretch so much that you lose control of the dogs, or that it encourages them to pull.....It gives just enough of a cushion that the dogs get a little tug if they get ahead of themselves...and its a lifesaver for my arm....I have tendonitis and the cushion this provides alleviates any sharp jerking motion from the dogs....Its well made and so easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Missy H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality-can't believe the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent quality product and well worth the price. It is very strong, sturdy and well made. It also came with a poop bag holder and training clicker which I didn't expect. The doggos love it and it is perfect for their size (30lbs & 25lbs)
customer_reviews.author: Liz Calato

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU WANT TO LOSE YOUR DOG
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I originally wrote the review below; HOWEVER, I was at the vet with my beagle and used this leash. He snapped it like a twig and we almost lost him. It took us a while to get him. It broke apart near the handle as though it was a fragile branch. My beagle is only 24 pounds and we keep one lead on his collar and the other on his harness so he doesn't feel pressure. If a 24 pound beagle can break this, I can't imagine what two dogs could do. DO NOT BUY!!!!! My initial review after only having this a few days: (Excellent lead. Very strong with a nice cushioned handle. Highly recommend.)
customer_reviews.author: Saved by Grace

customer_reviews.title: Definitely best $10 I spent. The guys love this.
customer_reviews.text: The guys say they love this upgrade. It has stopped my dogs from jolting in different directions. And keeps the dogs inline. I have two large dogs. Both over 60lbs. The price is spot on not outrageous like pet products are becoming. I think it was $10 something so if it goes above that ya know they are upping the price. Places like petsmart and the other one should stop being greedy and quit over pricing things for dogs. Which will drag their business into bankruptcy eventually. Companies should keep things affordable like this.
customer_reviews.author: feefee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I am walking a large dog and a small dog. Because the coupler is elastic and stretchy, the big dog lurches ahead and jerks the little dog around. This is a very well trained dog, but the elastic allows her to lurch forward and pull on the leash. With a regular leash, or with no leash, she heels exactly beside me, but with this elastic thing, she does not. It just isn't working for me, but it seems to be well made. No complaint about the quality of the product; just the usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it was just glued on
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. It broke after only three uses. One of my dogs pulled a little hard toward my husband who was just coming home from work and the piece connecting the handle to the metal part just broke. Looks like it was just glued on. We’ve had our other dual leash for years with no problems but I wanted one with a more cushioned handle. Very diasspointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kleebear

customer_reviews.title: Great for walks!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think this would work since one of my dogs moves at a faster pace than the other but I was surprised to see it worked just fine. The leash is adjustable so it could adjust the length between you and the dogs. It would have been nice to have the same option from the leash to the dog. When they want to take a restroom break it becomes a bit difficult. I also wish it came with a small loop to clip a poop bag holder. However im still pleased with this product and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple doggos
customer_reviews.text: I got this and used it the next day when picking up 5 dogs from a rescue transport. Much easier to potty 2 dogs at a time, and thus getting them loaded into my car was much faster. If traffic had cooperated, I would have been ahead of schedule in dropping them off to foster homes. Great device. Allows dogs to wander around to find a potty spot without dragging the other dog around. I'd get another, to do 4 dogs at a time, but I need a hand free to pick up poop. Need that surgically attached third arm that Zaphod Bebblebrox had to ski box with.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Methven

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice leash although I wish it was a little bit ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice leash although I wish it was a little bit lighter for my little Chihuahuas. This would be the perfect size for 10-20lb dogs like Schnauzers or Jack Russels. It is.a bit heavy/bulky for the toy breeds but my 5lb Chis don't seem to mind too much. The rope seems very sturdy and hopefully the hardware holds up well too. I like the handle but I do wish the length of the leash was longer for the person and shorter for the dogs because sometimes the added length allows one dog to walk on the wrong side of you and you end up tangled up between your pups.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: This leash is running my life. My dogs keep circuling each other and me it's a safety hazard for sure. Nothing like the picture of 2 dogs happily walking where the leash magically holds itself above the ground at human head level. Buy this if basically you want to spend 99% of your time square dancing with your dogs trying to make sure you don't fall on your face and they don't choke each other out not to mention a broken leg or 8 maybe even ten if you count mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, even for tiny dogs!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I wanted to buy this as a way to maintain the pulling my dogs do when being taken out, as well as keep them together whenever they see other dogs. The pulling that happens with their other leashes is basically stopped by this. It extends enough to give me room and not trip over them. I was also worried it would be overkill with them being smaller dogs, but it's perfect. My only issue, and it's a small one, is the push down mechanisms to attach it to their harnesses is a little stiff, but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Not for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered based on some of the reviews that said they used this leash on small dogs. My two dogs (12 lbs each) like to tangle leashes on their walks and I was hoping this would solve that problem. Unfortunately the clip that attaches to the collars is a little to bulky and heavy for my dogs. The weight of the leash made my dogs reluctant to walk. Instead of dealing with tangled leashes, I had to beg my dogs to keep walking. I’m sure it works fine for dogs that weight more than 15 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: PennyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend for anyone with awkward dogs
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who’s ever had to walk two dogs at one time, this is your savior! We have two rescue dogs, one is a medium shepherd mix who walks great on a leash, the other is a small chihuahua/terrier mix who didn’t have much (if any) leash time in her native Puerto Rico and zig zags as she walks. So dealing with the two on separate leashes was terrible. The dual leash helps keep them close and the smaller pup is now walking a lot better and makes walk time more pleasurable.
customer_reviews.author: chekD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leash
customer_reviews.text: Love this leash. I have three dogs, so walking them by myself can be tricky. The leash lets me walk two of the dogs at the same while still giving them plenty of space from each other--I bought another coupler leash once that was very short and forced the dogs to stand right next to each other all the time. This leash gives each pup plenty of space, should they need it. The handle is soft and comfortable, and the leash material is strong and braided. I am very glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Missy F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for training
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I recently got a new puppy, bringing me up to 2 dogs total... I find this leash very helpful in leash training the puppy. The leash seems to be very good quality and the dogs do not get tangled like they would with 2 leashes. I am used to a retractable leash (and I tried the splitter with it), but I now prefer this leash when walking both dogs.
customer_reviews.author: EAL

customer_reviews.title: Love but hate
customer_reviews.text: I love and hate this leash. I love it because it doesn’t tangle. BUT if you have dogs that pull, you better have muscle because it’s going to be a workout for you. I have 2 big dogs that pull and because the 2 bottom leashes are resistant bands, that’s what makes it extremely difficult. I worry it’s going to snap. It’s great having a 1 leash for both my dogs. It’s a great idea. But don’t expect this leash to make the walk easier if you got dogs that pull. This will definitely take a good while to get use to. But with the resistance issues, I’m really not sure if I want to continue with this one.
customer_reviews.author: RxQueen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash. It’s SO much easier walking our two dogs. We’ve been using it for about 5 months now and it’s still in great shape. Our dogs are around 35 & 55 pounds and they don’t pull too much, but we do have to pull them a decent amount because they stop and smell everything so it does hold up. The only thing I wish is that the handle was different. Our other regular leashes are cushion-y and rounded and it’s a lot more comfortable so I wish it was like those.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for smaller dogs
customer_reviews.text: The leash functions as advertised but it is not appropriate for all dogs. My (2) 12lbs dogs did not appreciate the shear weight of the leash. It is very bulky/sturdy. I can see this being fine for larger dogs, but it was not working with my small dogs. I tried several times but as we are moving/traveling I don’t have the luxury of training them; I need them to do their biz when I take them out and this leash did not help accomplish that task. I switched back to their individual leashes. Also, as it costs $5.99 to return a $12 item, I will be donating it locally.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Elastic straps snapped twice
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs: 48lbs and 30lbs. After the second walk with my dogs the elastic on the side with my larger dog snapped. I figured maybe it was faulty so I exchanged it for another one. It took several walks but eventually one side gave out. My dogs do pull a bit and this is probably why it gave out. However, this leash claims to more than handle this with it's weight limit. If your dog pulls, you may want to skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ay

customer_reviews.title: LEASH BROKE, DANGEROUS - DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This leash BROKE when walking my dogs, resulting in my dog running through the neighborhood. To have this leash break was infuriating and terrifying, and I will be pursuing a full refund. Horrible product, would not recommend to anyone and will never buy this company's products again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic leash
customer_reviews.text: I actually tried to cancel this order in favor of a triple leash but was too late. My good fortune. This leash is wonderful. A product that was designed with thought and experience. I have a 12 year old husky service dog trained and a year old husky puppy that’s a devil. I just got her and she’s never been on a leash. This leash works. I can actually walk both dogs together. Besides working well it’s made very well and feels wonderful in the hand. I recommend this leash to anyone wishing to walk two dogs at once. Any dog.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It's thick enough that the dogs won't chew through it and also a pretty decent length so they have their own space without the leash dragging. It is removable, so you can just walk one dog if needed. Great purchase and SO worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: maddy

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable leash must have if walking more than one dog at a time.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable leash must have if walking more than one dog at a time. This lease is processed 50% less then you’ll find an any pet store or other online shopping locale. Top-quality very comfortable handle and the metal piece that joins the two leashes together swivels around for comfort preventing pulling on your arm or jerking you forward. I have two small dogs And they love being walked with this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Thank heaven for this!
customer_reviews.text: Just got a 3rd dog. All 3 are between 20-27 lbs. I took the splitter part and am using it with a flexi leash for the 2 older dogs and have the puppy on her own leash. What a miracle to walk all 3 at the same time! Good amount of space between them, enough stretch, but keeps them from straining. I first tried a double retractable that got twisted up. This thing is sent from heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Gia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best $13 ive ever spent. Comes exactly as described. It makes walking 2 silly dogs at the same time so easy! The bungee part helps relieve the tension from the puller. The handle is soft and comfy. If you need a dual leash buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not for dogs that pull even slightly
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth between the one with bungee in it versus the regular leash. I ended up going bungee and wish that I did not. My dogs pull slightly on the occasion or will stop to sniff and because they have the extra stretch, it doesn’t not help to get them back on track. I have to actually reach down towards their harnesses rather than just giving the leash a slight tug. I gave it a solid month of use and have decided to discontinue using this leash and will purchase a different one. Lastly, the poop bag container is a nice thought to add but it is SO poorly attached to the leash that it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: emily dow

customer_reviews.title: Breaks and Kills Pets
customer_reviews.text: I put my two dogs on this leash with their harnesses, and the center grommet broke causing my younger pup to run out into the street and get hit by a car and killed. We were looking for something that could help my kids and I walk our two dogs easily and without tangling and this is definitely not a product I would buy again, we are heartbroken over losing our pup and I am kicking myself for not just spending a little more money on a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: MamaJ

customer_reviews.title: Well designed leash that makes walking two dogs easy
customer_reviews.text: I just recently got a second dog and going for walks became really stressful because I tried to manage using two separate leashes. My dogs kept getting tangled and going in different directions. This leash was a fantastic purchase and makes walking both my dogs so much easier. Each attachment point rotates, so the lines can't get twisted. Also, the leash is easy to control when my dogs walk at different speeds or go in different directions. I had some concerns about quality based on other reviews I read, but so far so good. I've got two pretty muscular dogs that can pull hard and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: DJT

customer_reviews.title: Med size fails 2 40lb labradoodles
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is nice on this leash, but the bungee part however failed to perform under the recommended guidelines as to what size you need to dogs weight. My 2 labradoodle puppies are 6 months and 35 and 40 lbs 75 total so I got the medium sized, 1 side blew out, other is ok. Step up 1 size just my 2 cents
customer_reviews.author: Joe007

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog owner
customer_reviews.text: I was needing one of these and shopped around and could not find one that was not expensive and did not meet my expectations. I went on Amazon and found this one very reasonably priced and sent for it. I am pleased with the way it works with the swivel on it and the handle is so relaxing to take the dogs for a walk with! I would recommend this seller to anyone for the fast service great price and quality product she sells!
customer_reviews.author: marianne

customer_reviews.title: Great durable leash
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried reading other reviews which mentioned the metal was rusted, but my leash came in perfect condition. I have used it twice daily since purchasing earlier this month, and I absolutely love it! My two terrier mixes are 10.9 and 34 pounds, and neither has any issues. Both are on body harnesses rather than linked directly to their collars, which makes a big difference. The swivel works great and leads to no tangles, and the hand grip has a slight resistance which helps me keep a strong grip on the leash if one of them sees another dog and wants to try running. Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.author: angatd

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash
customer_reviews.text: I was using two separate leashes for my dogs, then my husband bought me this one, and it’s so much better! My older dog sometimes doesn’t appreciate being pulled around by my younger dog, but it’s easier for the human not to have to keep untangling leashes when they cross in front of each other. The ends are also bungees, so it allows some motion for the dog before the other gets pulled back.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.JR

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for training pullers
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 60lbs and a puller, she’s come a long way but she still pulls. I love bungee leashes but there is no way this is holding back a 60lb dog. Feels durable enough material, she just treats it like it’s a normal leash without bungee. My 20lb puppy can also pull this to full extension with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: At first I thought this was so cool and it was everything that I wanted for my ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was so cool and it was everything that I wanted for my two chihuhauhas but I was wrong. The leashes are too short/close together so trying to take the dogs to go potty with this is not an option- unless you want them yanking each other and coughing every 3 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Alondra

customer_reviews.title: Leash Tangles You In it bc Bungees are too long
customer_reviews.text: This was so inexpensive I thought maybe I would just keep it for the coupler portion but its too stretchy. The leash is not that great but the foam on the inside was nice. The bungee part that attaches to the dogs extends too far for my two Airedales. They don't need three whole feet and then another 4 with the leash part. That's too little control. Would not recommend this leash.
customer_reviews.author: IndyInTheCity

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, sturdy leash for a large dog/small dog combo
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make walking 2 dogs easier and decided to purchase the black, elastic double leash. It is very sturdy and easy/comfortable to hold due to the padded leash (which, by the way does not flex and stays firm should the dogs pull...nice!). The clips are heavy duty and my pups seem to pull less due to the elastic leash. This leash makes dog walking more enjoyable. Pups used to get tangled up constantly with 2 leashes...problem solved. So happy I purchased this. Love the added clip on clean up bags with holder!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: I'm a dog walker, great investment!
customer_reviews.text: The 1st picture is my 3 dogs. Very difficult to walk them on 3 different leashes, which is why I bought this. It's so much easier now. I decided to test it on some of my clients. Labradoodles, French bull dogs, and small dogs. This is really helpful and sturdy! I love it. Being a dog walker & doing 8-10+ miles daily, I do wish it was a different handle where I can have my hand in it securely & not have to hold it tightly for long periods of time. It does twist up some, I think the part that is supposed to spin is to tight. However, it is a very good leash so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I’m a dog sitter and thought this may help with multiple dogs and it does. The dogs have to be close to the same size and energy level though. I have a puppy chihuahua and 11 year old Schnoodle and it didn’t not work well. The chihuahua even though small kept Yanking my older pup. Will work once the chihuahua is fully trained. It also came with a whistle/clicker which is helping with training! And poop bags and holder for our long walks! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine525

customer_reviews.title: Leash components break or the cords come apart after a few months of daily use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two peteast double dog leashes. They came together in one package. I use the leashes daily on hikes in the mountains and occasionally on backpacking trips. I liked the two-dog function of these leashes, the comfort of the handle, the length was just right for walking two dogs, and the swivel that keeps the leashes from getting tangled. I did not like the durability. The thumb latch on the clips on both sets of leashes broke very easily. Within a few months of daily use, the cords came apart where they attach to the clips. I would consider repurchasing and being much more delicate with the leashes but the price doubled since my original purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this today and immediately took my two dogs out to try it out. First off, it came in a nice sturdy box, very well packaged. I read reviews on several others before I chose this one. Lots of people said the others tangled, even though they stated "tangle free". This one was recommended by the AKC and it had good reviews so I went with it. I am impressed so far. It worked perfectly! It never tangled, not even sure it could. It seems very sturdy and well made. The handle is also very comfortable. I would highly recommend this leash. Hopefully it will hold up! Only time will tell. Otherwise it gets 5 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good for 2 small dogs! No, tangles!
customer_reviews.text: I love this double leash! I've tried several in the past and returned them, this one I'm keeping! It's light weight, seems to be well made, handle is comfortable to hold, it's long enough to give space to each dog if one has to stop and use the bathroom! They don't get tangled and it seems strong enough to control my 2 little chihuahuas! I don't think that this would hold up for any dog bigger than 15lbs. I love it and am pretty happy with my choice!! .
customer_reviews.author: Envy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver, or finger saver I should say! Prior to buying this, I had two separate leashes for my large dogs and one of my dogs made a sudden move, wrapping my finger in between the leashes nearly breaking it. I've been using this leash for two months now and it is awesome! Not only do you not have to manipulate them separately, the dogs pull each other instead of you. I would recommend this to anyone with any sized dogs.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: I love this leash
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash. I have a big boxer mix (60lbs) and a 6 month old Shih Tzu/Bichon mix (10lbs). I can comfortably walk them together on this leash. The swivel feature on this leash is great. They can cross each other without getting tangled up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: This makes it easy to walk 2 dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad knee and walking the dogs has been a chore for me because they tend to pull too hard, wrap around my legs, wrap around each other, and we generally end up spending more time disentangling the dogs then we do walking. This is so much better than two separate leashes. They don’t pull as much because they are walking together.They find they can’t get ahead of each other. There is a little bit of tangling if they step over the leash when they stop but it’s minimal, and very easy to fix. I would recommend this for anyone who has more than one dog.
customer_reviews.author: KathyS

customer_reviews.title: A safe way to walk two dogs at one time.
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash! I have two active Australian Shepard's who can tie me up in knots within seconds. The way this leash is designed allows me to control them and cuts down on the chances of me falling.
customer_reviews.author: mccaskeytl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This item actually works really well and with both of my dogs on their harnesses it gives me a free hand. The only problem is that on day 2 one of the bungees broke. I have ordered a new one and hope the first one was just defective. Your pet really needs the bungy to soften the tug from when their walking mate pulls them in the opposite direction. I would recommend this item for 2 dogs that are the same size or dogs that don’t pull because the smaller dog will have a rough walk.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I ordered this - I have two large dogs that pull on the leash most of the time. This thing is DURABLE, very lightweight and very comfortable to hold, especially when you've got 120 pounds of dog pulling. The blue is very pretty also, which is just a nice little bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Celine

customer_reviews.title: An elegant solution
customer_reviews.text: I've had this leash a few days now. My dogs are about 20 pounds each. Walking them is much less chaotic now that I don't have a tangle of leashes to deal with. With my single leashes, I wrap the loop around my wrist, just in case one of the dogs goes after a squirrel and jerks the leash. It's not really possible to do that with the double leash, but I have a feeling some alternative way of holding the leash securely may reveal itself as I get more accustomed to using it. The leash is a good price and worth giving a try.
customer_reviews.author: UniCorgi

customer_reviews.title: Nice leash.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has reflective material seen into it for night-walk visibility. The whole thing feels decently strong. I have beagles and, well, they pull. Hard. The two leads are stretchy. Makes it gentler on the dogs as well as my wrist. Note- do not leash a large dog to a small dog unless the larger dog is well behaved. X-D
customer_reviews.author: Erica E.

customer_reviews.title: Great leash for my 2 puppies
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 -5 month old labs & this leash makes it great for training them to walk together. It’s so much easier to control both of them at the same time and it keeps them from going every which way but loose ! I don’t get twisted up in there curiosity & when they get distracted by EVERYTHING.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for walking two dogs
customer_reviews.text: I was intrigued with the idea but a little concerned to have my two male German Shepherds tethered together. No problem at all. They are able to do their business separately and can easily change positions without me having to untangle any leashes. They have quite a bit of lead when spread out you’ll be pleasantly surprised. The only down side is the nylon rope. It’s really hard on your hands. The handle itself is padded but if your trying to pull by the nylon it’s pretty rough.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 2nd time using
customer_reviews.text: Broke on 2nd time using it. Luckily, I was there with my husband walking the puppies, so we saved them from running towards the car! This is absolutely waste of money, and mostly dangerous for you paw babies! So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This makes it easy to take out my two petite golden retrievers. They’re both less than 50 lbs. Any bigger, and this leash would not work. The only thing I’d change is making the loops longer so they can walk a little bit further apart. I recommend using with a harness
customer_reviews.author: SCrifaci

customer_reviews.title: Love this leash, but disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Up until a month ago it was the perfect leash to help wrangle my 110lb and 50lb beasts, but the clasp broke on one of the leash ends. It's the notch you press down on to open the clasp so it's not completely unusable...I just have to pry it open with my fingernail every time I hook my dog up. It's difficult to do with wiggling bodies and I keep snapping my nail off. If you don't mind the possibility of having to replace your leash every year then I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cherice Silva

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleasantly surprised by how strong this leash feels. I was a little worried about how it was going to feel once I opened it. I am really happy with it. I have a 25 pound pug and 7 pound chiweenie, so the only thing I’m worried about if if this is going to be too heavy for the little one. This is pretty heavy. I loved that they sent a free poop bag holder with poop bags so I’m all ready to go in a walk once I received it. I’ll update this if anything happens to it but upon first opening this seems awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Belvedere

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: The leash does still get somewhat tangled when they keep switching sides. Doesn't actually spin like it states. Quality is questionable. Only take this on short walks because I am nervous the clasp could break when they get pulling. They are only a combined 40 pounds. Hard when one has to go potty and the other is still pulling :)
customer_reviews.author: Joel Tichacek

customer_reviews.title: small dogs cannot pull the bungees, there fore otty breaks are cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: all the good stuff like lightning fast shipping, great price, very sturdy, however too small dogs are too close and get in ech others way at potty time. I thought the extenders were adjustable and they are not, and the bungees are too strong (and pretty heavy) for a light weight dog to stretch them out.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large dogs. it streches.
customer_reviews.text: This the one stretches like bunge cord . Perfect for large dogs. Heavy duty. Sturdy. Well made. Peteast service department is very prompt, willing to work with, make sure that customers who purchased their products get what they deserve, good service. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: G.T.C.H.

customer_reviews.title: Super design at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We walk two neighbor dogs each day and they were a mess- pulling, getting tangled, and wandering in separate directions. This leash is way more than I expected for the codex but it’s fantastic! The hardware seems sturdy and I love the padded handle. The dogs do not get tangled. It’s much easier to control them and enjoy the walk.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lemley

customer_reviews.title: Helpful leash when you want to hold on to two dogs at once!
customer_reviews.text: My friend has two dogs and has been using two separate leashes forever. This was a gift for her. She loves it! Both her dogs get along famously so I guess that is something you should factor in...Also, her dogs are small, so they're easy to handle. The leash itself is very well built and my friend is super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kukreja

customer_reviews.title: Well worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 dogs that love taking me for a walk. One dog is 90 pounds and the other is 20 pounds. I thought I was being creative by trying their two leashes together but they always got tangled up and the little one likes crossing back and forth (she's a a puppy). Needless to say, I needed a solution. Saw this dual leash for $8.99 (wow!) And it was durable, stylish and works perfectly. It even came with convenient doggie waste bags and a clicker to keep on your wrist for training (what? Bonus!). Now I walk the dogs!❤
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Leamons

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: The poop bag holder broke after less than 24 hours with no major strain. Very cheap. Would NOT recommend this for dogs over 40lbs. The leash clips are VERY small. The worst bit, which I didn't realize before buying is that the handle is hard plastic which makes it very hard to loop around your wrist, and also makes it very likely you will drop the leash in the event of a surprise pull, as the leash just loops through the handle, and therefore it spins as you move
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: but this product seems to work better for my dogs than other products I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a few weeks, but this product seems to work better for my dogs than other products I've tried. One is a 10 year old heeler and the other is a 1 year old German Shepherd. They're the same size but they walk at different speeds and this gives them a little more freedom to move around. I've gotten tangled once or twice, but I think that's unavoidable. My dogs don't pull on the leash, but one of them likes to chew things up, so I think this product should last as long as I don't leave them unattended with it. I'll update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: afizzo

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mother who has a bichon shih tzu mix and lhaso apso. She loves it says they walk so much better hook together to one leash and they dont get tangle or try to trip her with the leashes anymore. Plus no more lack of circulation in her hands trying to control 2 leashes loves the padding on the new leash handle
customer_reviews.author: Honest opinions only

customer_reviews.title: We use it with a harness on one and a gentle leader on the other and it works great with both
customer_reviews.text: This has solved my dogwalking problems!! We just got a 50lb pitbull to go with our 50lb lab mix. I had been struggling with 2 leashes. Then I tried a leash coupler (that was a disaster). This leash is incredible! Maybe once a walk I have to step over it because one dog has gone behind me. But the swivel setting where the leashes meet makes tangling almost impossible. We use it with a harness on one and a gentle leader on the other and it works great with both. Our dogs don't pull much, but I could see how that could be a concern for some dog owners with this leash as the clips do not look super strong.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Almost killed mt dog's! I have 1 8lb & 1 15lb dog ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Completely broke off while I was walking on a main road!! My dog's are only 8lbs & 15lbs!!! They almost got hit by a car!
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Walk 2 dogs 👍🏻 4 dogs not so much
customer_reviews.text: The cushion made it easy to hold on to, but I wish I could change the distance the dogs can seperate from each other. They want to go around me and be a pain. I walk four dogs with two leashes by using a collar connector that allows me to shorten the distance, so walk more in tandem. I think if your walking two dogs with a little training this would leash would work well.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Naum

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this dual leash if you have dogs that have a tendency to pull
customer_reviews.text: The dual bungee's actually encourages even more pulling, and while they are pulling... you are unable to make the correction of them feeling you pull back on them so they will slow down. Essentially you are unabe to gain control. You end up being dragged along for a walk, and your wrist will become strained. The bungee's also get caught under the dogs tails while sniffing around. I have one Brittany with a short tail, and the other is a labrador retreiver with a long tail (this happens on both). * One positive is the materials are of good, sturdy quality, so if you have dogs that don't pull this may be a good fit for you!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking - Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The leash is very poor quality. The bungee on one side popped after 2 days and the other in about 3 weeks. I don’t feel secure waking my two dogs with this leash. The main leash is a little too long and the adjustable part slides rather than staying in place. I will be buying a new leash from a different manufacturer and tossing this one in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: good leahes and company
customer_reviews.text: I have a 70 lb husky and 40 lb shepard who I have used these leashes for. When I first used it my dog was pulling to hard the internal pully snapped. I contacted the company and the had great customer service and shipped me out a new one. Thank you for your understanding and resending another when there was a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Everhardt

customer_reviews.title: pet east dual double dog leash
customer_reviews.text: Used it once. There isn't much rope for the person to hold, the dogs have more leash length. I have to try it again, but not crazy about this. They didn't get tangled, but my older dog was slow and I got tangled in his part of this leash. The younger dog was ahead of me. So I had to put my hand down to the dual area, slow the young dog down, and walk them this way.
customer_reviews.author: PKSreviewer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS LEASH  if you have large dogs!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS DOUBLE LEASH if you have large dogs!! I was walking my two large dogs and while pulling back on the leash- it BROKE! I was very lucky that my dogs did not run into traffic! I would return it for a refund if returning stuff to AMAZON was not such a PAIN!! NOTE: AMAZON TERRIBLE QUALITY CONTROL ONCE AGAIN!!
customer_reviews.author: Fresno Robotics

customer_reviews.title: Love this leash
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this leash! I have two dogs, one is about 65 lbs and the other is 35 lbs. My 65lb dog is a puller no matter what I do. My 35 lb dog loves to be right next to her sister at all times causing the li ea to get tangled. With this leash they don't get tangled. The bunge end takes most of the pull away from the dogs. I can now enjoy walking my dogs instead of dreading it. I don't know why I waited this long to get this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Lorenzano

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great leash
customer_reviews.text: I love having this lead for my two smallish dogs. It’s so much easier having them connected to each other. Instead of pulling my arm, they pull each other so they’ve had to learn to walk together, which is awesome. Our walls are much more enjoyable for all of us now.
customer_reviews.author: ASA

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I have two small Yorkshire terrier dogs that are always getting tangled up on me while walking. I received this leash a week ago and so far it has been great. The dogs are much easier to walk. The quality of this leash is really nice for the low cost. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Masucci

customer_reviews.title: No more tangled leashes
customer_reviews.text: I have two small dogs that I like to walk in the evenings. It was such a hassle using two leashes always having to untangle them and switching hands. I was always afraid I would accidentally let one of the leashes drop. This leash is amazing, no more struggling and they each have plenty of room to do their own investigating. Great design and well made. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cosplay

customer_reviews.title: Unless Your Dogs Are Trained Walkers Dont Buy
customer_reviews.text: If your dogs walk in front of you at a slow pace and don't want to roam, this may be a good leash for you. On the other hand if you are trying to control two medium size dogs who want to walk around you, behind you and pull you then don't get this leash. When they do walk in front and catch a smell, watch out! you better have some water skiing experience......Very hard to control and the handle is awkward. Wont buy again, paid too much to dread the walk and shoulder jerk.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

product_meta.title: Peteast Double Dog Leash, Adjustable Heavy Duty Double Leash for Dogs Dual Dog Leash 360°Tangle Free & Soft Handle Two Dog Leash, Walking & Training Leash Two Dogs，2020 Upgraded
feature_bullets: Upgraded Version - The first dual dog leash with adjustable handle on the market. You can adjust the optimal length for walking with dogs. Enjoy free control!

Reflective Stitching - Benefit extra safety at night with the luminous reflective stitching that spans the length of both leashes. Our reflective seams are a must to help you stand out in the dark and essential for you and your dogs' safety.

Shock Absorbing Bungee Leash - Unique Bungee Design helps to absorb the shock of quick movement when used with energetic and active dogs, reduce the feeling of being pulled. The length of the bungee can be extended from 23 to 35 inch with strong pulling force, which gives your dogs enough room to run in front of you or beside you.
Heavy Duty & Comfort - Withstands 100 pounds of pull. No more burned hands with the soft padded handle. Soft padded handle brings ultimate comfort and lets you free up one hand while walking 2 dogs
360° Tangle Free - Never to worry about getting twisted leashes while walking 2 dogs, allowing your dogs to move freely around you.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
